synthesis_method: The electrolyte synthesis process involved weighing and mixing lithium sulfide (Li2S) and titanium disulfide (TiS2) powders in a 1:1 molar ratio in an argon-filled glove box, followed by mechanical milling treatment at 510 rpm for 20 to 100 hours using a ball mill with zirconia balls to produce Li2TiS3 powder.
